relationshipManager.name: Mark Thompson
relationshipManager.description: Relationship Manager with 10+ years' experience in Odyssey's Bank Online. Currently managing ultra-high net worth clients across the UK with combined AUM of 200 million GBP.

contactDetails.address:
PO Box 17484
34 Sample Court, Example Avenue SW 8EP London

reviews.description: The best RM I ever meet. It's an awesome experience that can work together with you. Help me a lot of things in Odyssey Bank Online. Here's to the start of a good working relationship!
